§ World 18

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

[[world-18]], usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation influenced by //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記), as well as ancient Egyptian mythology, and Persian mythology.
